data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_AccountSetupInvalid
data.value: There is an issue with the setup of your account. Please contact the administrator (L:001)
data.comment: Occurs when the setup in AD is incorrect for a WVS user (e.g. they do not belong to a valid WVS group, not attached to an Office etc) - Resolution -AD

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_ErrorMappingProviderAccountToLocal
data.value: Your account was found in TRAMS however there is an issue bringing your information into TravelEdge ADX. Please contact the system administrator for support. (L:002)
data.comment: There was a problem with the account mapping from TRAMS to WVS - perhaps the TRAMS groups were not set up properly. Resolution - TRAMS.

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_MembershipAuthenticationFailed
data.value: Login failed - could not validate credentials. Please retry and if you are still encountering a problem, contact your system administrator. (L:003)
data.comment: Most common case - incorrect username or password - Resolution - User (incorrect info), AD (username or password)

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_MultipleMatchesOnEmail
data.value: There is an issue with the setup of your account. Please contact the system administrator for support. (L:004)
data.comment: There is more than one account in TRAMS with the given email address. Email addresses need to be unique - Resolution -TRAMS

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_NoMatchOnEmail
data.value: There is an issue with the setup of your account. Please contact the system administrator for support. (L:005)
data.comment: There isn't an account in TRAMS with a matching primary email. Resolution - TRAMS

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_ProfileSyncCreateFailedTRAMSUnavailable
data.value: Your profile can not be created as TRAMS is down. Please contact the system administrator for support. (L:006)
data.comment: The connection to TRAMS is down - can not create the profile for the agent. Resolution - IT (Server issue)

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_ProfileSyncUpdateFailedTRAMSUnavailable
data.value: Your profile can not be updated as TRAMS is down. Please contact the system administrator for support. (L:007)
data.comment: The connection to TRAMS is down - can not update the profile for the agent however we can still let them log in using their existing local account. Resolution - IT (Server issue)

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_ProviderNoLongerReturnsAccount
data.value: Your account has been deactivated in TRAMS. Please contact the system administrator for support.(L:008)
data.comment: TRAMS is no longer returning the given account - quite likely it has been deactivated or deleted. Resolution -TRAMS

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_TC_UserNotInCache
data.value: The timeout period for T&C acceptance has expired. Please go back to the login page and try again.
data.comment: The preauth cookie doesn't have a match in the cache - the most likely explaination is that it has been kicked out of the cache. The timeout for this is 30mins so the user has that long from when they log in to accepting the T&C.

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_UserNameNotFound
data.value: Can not find user. Please contact the system administrator for support. (L:009)
data.comment: Occurs when the email address the user types in can not be matched to a username in AD. Resolution - User (incorrect email) or AD (email does not exist)

data.name: Biz_Auth_Reset_CouldNotSendEmail
data.value: There was an error sending the email, please try again later.
data.comment: This not a validation error, there was a system error sending the email so all they can do is try later or contact support.

data.name: Biz_Auth_Reset_PasswordPolicy
data.value: The password does not meet the password policy requirements.

data.name: Biz_Auth_Reset_TokenExpired
data.value: The password reset link has expired.

data.name: Biz_CruiseService_NotBookable
data.value: The selected cruise service has already been booked.

data.name: Biz_Dev_Examples_BusinessException
data.value: Could not process due to invalid data.

data.name: Biz_FareCode_Invalid
data.value: The selected fare code is invalid, please select another one and try again
data.comment: Selection of cabin failed due to the invalid fare code

data.name: Biz_Invalid_CreditCard
data.value: Invalid credit card information was specified for at least one of the payment credit cards.
data.comment: Validation of the credit card type based on the credit card number failed for at least one of the payment credit cards that were specified in the payment items.

data.name: Biz_Invalid_Currency
data.value: Currency has not been provided or is invalid

data.name: Biz_Invalid_File
data.value: Please select filename without special characters in it.
data.comment: Notifies the user that the specified filename is not valid due to special characters that prevent the server side parsing.

data.name: Biz_Invalid_NumOfPassengers
data.value: Invalid number of passengers

data.name: Biz_Invalid_Quote_Status
data.value: Unable to complete operation for the quote {0} due to the current quote status: {1}.
data.comment: The quote items are not eligible for billing due to the current quote status.

data.name: Biz_Invalid_TotalInPayment
data.value: The total amount from all the credit cards is not equal to the Total in Trip Payment Summary. Please correct it and try again.
data.comment: The exception is raised whenever the total amount from all the specified credit cards is not equal to the amount that is presented as total due in the Trip Payment summary.

data.name: Biz_Payments_Amadeus_MultipleCreditCards
data.value: Payment with multiple credit cards is unsupported. Please use only one credit card.

data.name: Biz_Payments_Amadeus_ValidationMessages
data.value: Please check the entry in the following fields: {0}

data.name: Biz_Payments_AmountReceivedUnchanged
data.value: There was an error processing the payment.
data.comment: Price booking calls before and after the modify booking call did not equal the payment amount.

data.name: Biz_Payments_BillingDetails_Quote_Status
data.value: Unable to complete operation for the quote {0} due to the current quote status: {1}.
data.comment: The quote items are not eligible for billing due to the current quote status.

data.name: Biz_Payments_Invalid_CreditCard
data.value: Invalid credit card type was specified for at least one of the payment credit cards. Please specify a valid credit card type for the payment.
data.comment: Validation of the credit card type based on the credit card number failed for at least one of the payment credit cards that were specified in the payment items.

data.name: Biz_Payments_PayPal_InsufficientFundsOrDeclined
data.value: Transaction was declined or failed due to insufficient funds

data.name: Biz_Payments_PayPal_Invalid_Amount
data.value: The specified amount is invalid

data.name: Biz_Payments_PayPal_Invalid_BillingInfo
data.value: The specified Billing Information is invalid

data.name: Biz_Payments_PayPal_Invalid_CreditCard_Information
data.value: The specified Credit Card details are invalid

data.name: Biz_Payments_PayPal_Invalid_CreditCard_Type
data.value: The specified Credit Card type is invalid

data.name: Biz_Payments_Unsupported_CreditCard
data.value: One of the specified credit cards is an unsupported credit card type.

data.name: Biz_Quote_AddCruise_InformativePricingMissing
data.value: An attempt to get the informative pricing for a quote failed. The quote is in invalid status. Please try creating another one.
data.comment: Cabin selection when creating the quote failed to provide valid informative pricing for the quote

data.name: Biz_Quote_AddCruise_PassengerPriceBreakdownsMissing
data.value: Error adding cruise to quote, it looks like the price server is down, please try again later. If this issue continues, please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.
data.comment: Traveler price breakdowns collection is empty, most likley the front ends price booking call to Amadeus failed.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Copy_NotSupportedPostBook
data.value: Quote copy is not supported with a booked cruise.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Modify_NotSupportedPostBook
data.value: Quote modify is not supported with a booked cruise.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Modify_PassengerPriceBreakdownsMissing
data.value: Error modifying quote, it looks like the price server is down, please try again later. If this issue continues, please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.
data.comment: Traveler price breakdowns collection is empty, most likley the front ends price booking call to Amadeus failed.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Reprice_BookedNetRateFare
data.value: Repricing booked quotes with net rate fare code is not allowed
data.comment: An attempt to re-price a booked quote associated with net fare code was made.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Reprice_InformativePricingMissing
data.value: An attempt to re-price the selected quote failed due to inability to provide informative pricing. Original quote pricing was preserved.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Reprice_MissingTravelers
data.value: Please provide list of travelers before issuing the re-pricing action

data.name: Biz_Quote_TMT_TripAndProductsSyncFailed_Format
data.value:
Update in finance system failed for the following items:
{0}
Please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com
data.comment: An attempt to create or update the quote and related travel services with the trip and the products in TMT failed

data.name: Biz_Quote_UnavailableTravelerPricingBreakdown
data.value: Retrieval of detailed price breakdown per traveler failed. Please try again later or with different cabin.
data.comment: The response from the provider method GetFinalPricingBreakDown failed. It was expected to provide detailed pricing breakdown per traveler for the selected cabin. Potential misconfiguration of the response data in CruisePriceBreakdownDto

data.name: Biz_Reprice_InvalidCruiseServiceState
data.value: Reprice can not be performed. The cruise travel service is not in booked or deposit state.
data.comment: Reprice function, after booking process, only works if the cruise travel service is in booked or deposit state.

data.name: Biz_Trams_ValidationError_Default
data.value: There was an error with the communication to TRAMS. Please check your input and contact servicedesk@traveledge.com if you continute to have this problem.
data.comment: This is returned if there is an issue validating a request being sent to the trams api that the client could possibly solve themselves. It does indicate a error on our side, but possibly not a critical error that would stop the agent in their tracks. This is used on client create but possibly on other areas too.

data.name: Ex_Authentication_Default
data.value: Unauthorized or login timed out

data.name: Ex_Book_TMTSync
data.value: Unable to record the information in TMT, please contact your administrator to look into the issue closely.

data.name: Ex_Conflict_Clients_PhoneNumberNotUnique
data.value: The phone number for this client is already in use.
data.comment: The phone number for the client is already in use. This needs to be changed to an unique number so an interfaceid can be generated

data.name: Ex_Conflict_Default
data.value: The resource you are trying to add conflicted with an existing resource

data.name: Ex_Conflict_Dev_ExampleConflictMessage
data.value: There is already a value of {0}. Please choose another.

data.name: Ex_CookieMissing
data.value: Please ensure you have cookies enabled and try again.
data.comment: A cookie is missing from the request - user should ensure cookies are on and try again

data.name: Ex_Dev_Examples_TravelEdgeException
data.value: A custom internal server error

data.name: Ex_Exception_AgentNotFound
data.value: Logged-in agent information is not found or is invalid. Please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com to get your agent profile set up correctly.
data.comment: Logged-in agent's information is not found or is invalid

data.name: Ex_Exception_CruiseLineOperationNotSupported
data.value: The operation performed is not supported by the selected cruise line operator

data.name: Ex_Exception_CruiseLine_Not_Supported
data.value: The selected cruise line is not supported by the system
data.comment: The selected cruise line is not supported as of the moment.

data.name: Ex_Exception_Default
data.value: An error occurred, please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com

data.name: Ex_Exception_FileUpload
data.value: Unable to persist uploaded file, please try again.
data.comment: Something bad happened when uploading the client file.

data.name: Ex_Exception_NoResponseFromProvider
data.value: No response from provider, please try again.
data.comment: The request has been sent to provider but has received no response or details about the results of the response.

data.name: Ex_Exception_Payment_Default
data.value: Payment cannot be processed at this time, please try again later or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com

data.name: Ex_Exception_ProviderError
data.value: An error occurred in the provider, please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com
data.comment: The request has been sent to the provider but received ambiguous response.

data.name: Ex_Exception_SailingError
data.value: There is a problem with the selected sailing, please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com

data.name: Ex_Exception_SailingMapping
data.value: An error occurred on a selection, please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com
data.comment: The error in this case is related to mapping or retrieving information from the system's database, i.e sailing, occupation, etc.

data.name: Ex_Exception_UserNotFound
data.value: Logged-in user information is not found or is invalid.
data.comment: Logged-in user information is not found or is invalid

data.name: Ex_GeneralProcessingExceptionInOperation
data.value: Unable to complete '{0}' operation due to internal server error. Please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com
data.comment: An internal server error that was not handled as a known exception interrupted the processing of the requested action. For {0}, put a descriptive name for the action that is being performed in the method.

data.name: Ex_Invalid_CodeX
data.value: Invalid {0} identifier
data.comment: Server-side was unable to load an instance by the specified identifier or code.

data.name: Ex_Invalid_CruiseTravelService
data.value: The Cruise Travel Service is invalid

data.name: Ex_Invalid_Currency
data.value: Invalid Currency
data.comment: an attempt to fetch the associated currency resulted with null instance.

data.name: Ex_Invalid_Payment_Summary
data.value: Invalid Payment Summary
data.comment: payment summary is either null or does not have any payments associated.

data.name: Ex_Invalid_Quote
data.value: This quote ID is not valid, please try again with a valid quote ID.
data.comment: an attempt to load the quote resulted with null instance.

data.name: Ex_NotFound_Default
data.value: The requested resource does not exist or can not be found

data.name: Ex_Payment_Processing_Default
data.value: Unable to process payments. Please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com
data.comment: General payment processing exception. See the developer message and logs for more deails.

data.name: Ex_Payment_Processing_RecordingToTMTFailed
data.value: Payment completed successfully, however, the data was not fully recorded in the finance system. Please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com
data.comment: Payment through the payment processors completed and TravelEdge database was updated successfully but the recording in TMT failed.

data.name: Ex_Payment_Processing_RecordingToTMTFailed_InvoiceAndVendorPayment
data.value: Record to both Invoice and Vendor Payments completed with errors {0}
data.comment: Both attempts to record invoice and vendor payment failed in TMT

data.name: Ex_Payment_Processing_RecordingToTMTFailed_InvoicePayment
data.value: Record to Invoice Payment completed with errors {0}
data.comment: The attempt to record the invoice payment failed

data.name: Ex_Payment_Processing_RecordingToTMTFailed_VendorPayment
data.value: Record to Vendor Payment completed with errors {0}
data.comment: The attempt to record the vendor payment failed

data.name: Ex_Unauthorized_Default
data.value: User does not have access to this resource

data.name: Val_Email_Default
data.value: The email address entered is invalid, please enter a correct email address.
data.comment: The email address is not valid

data.name: Val_MaxLengthX_Default
data.value: cannot exceed {0} characters

data.name: Val_NullInput_Default
data.value: This is a required field.
data.comment: It is unlikely this is the users issue but it is something that UI can fix.

data.name: Val_RangeIntXY_Default
data.value: The {0} must be between and {1} or {2}

data.name: Val_RegularExpression_PhoneFormat
data.value: The phone number is invalid, please enter a valid phone number.
data.comment: The regex check for a phone number failed. It must contain at least 10 digits.It is used for phone, fax etc numbers that can be saved for a client, agent etc.

data.name: Val_Required_DateFuture
data.value: Future date value is required

data.name: Val_Required_DatePast
data.value: Past date value is required

data.name: Val_Required_BirthYearMin
data.value: Please specify a date of birth from January 1, 1914 onwards for all passengers.
data.comment: Traveler's birth year is less than minimum allowed.

data.name: Val_Required_Default
data.value: This is a required field

data.name: Val_Required_Default_Provider
data.value: There are required fields with missing values: {0}

data.name: Val_Client_Itin_Email
data.value:
Hello,
Please find attached the quote for your upcoming trip.

If you have any questions please give me a call.

Best Regards,

data.name: Val_Invoice_Email
data.value:
Hello,
Please find attached the invoice for your upcoming trip.

If you have any questions please give me a call.

Best Regards,

data.name: Email_PayPalCaptureFailed_Body_Format
data.value: PayPal Capturing Authorization failed with the following messages: {0}
data.comment: The format for the email body sent to email to support when PayPal capture fails

data.name: Email_PayPalCaptureFailed_Subject
data.value: PayPal Capture Authorization Failed
data.comment: The subject that will be stated when sending email to support when PayPal capture fails

data.name: Ex_Cancel_TMTSync
data.value: Unable to record the information in TMT, please contact your administrator to look into the issue closely.

data.name: Biz_Email_Invalid_Recipient
data.value: There was a problem with the recipients specified. Please check and try again.

data.name: Ex_Email_No_Agent_Email
data.value: The agent's email was either not found or setup incorrectly. Please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.

data.name: Ex_Email_No_PDF_Returned
data.value: The PDF could not be generated. Please try again later.

data.name: Email_ResetPassword_ResetTokenMessage_Body
data.value:
ADX received a request to reset the password for your {0} account.
To reset your password, copy and paste the URL into your browser: {1}
_____________________________________________________________________________
Please do not reply to this message; it was sent from an unmonitored email address. This message is a service email related to your use of ADX.
data.comment: {0} is the username/email address {1} is the reset URL

data.name: Email_ResetPassword_ResetTokenMessage_Subject
data.value: Password Reset Request

data.name: Biz_Quote_CabinUnHold
data.value: The selected cabin was successfully released with the cruise provider but failed to update the ADX database. Please proceed with the selection of the new cabin since that action will sync up the cruise service with the provider again.
data.comment: Call to Amadeus completed successfully but removal of the cabin from the associated cruise travel service in ADX database failed. Selection of another cabin will override the existing one, therefore the user was advised to proceed with selection of another cabin.

data.name: Val_Alphanumeric
data.value: This field must be alphanumeric.

data.name: Biz_FareCode_AirNotAvailable
data.value: There are no airfares available for the selected departure airport.

data.name: Biz_ReconciliationPayment_PaymentNotSufficient
data.value: The payment sent is not sufficient to reconcile the travel service payment discrepancy.
data.comment: This occurs when the payment sent from the Cruise Payment Reconciliation admin screen is not sufficient.

data.name: Biz_ReconciliationPayment_ZeroAmountPayment
data.value: The payment sent for reconciliation is zero

data.name: BonVoyage_Email_Body
data.value:
Enjoy your trip!

If I can be of any further assistance before you travel, please do not hesitate to contact me. My email address and phone numbers can be found below.

Kind regards.

data.name: BonVoyage_Email_Subject
data.value: Bon Voyage!

data.name: WelcomeHome_Email_Body
data.value:
Thank you for entrusting me with your recent travel arrangements. I hope that your journey exceeded your expectations and that you had a wonderful time while you were away.

I would appreciate any comments and feedback about the quality of travel services I arranged for you.

I look forward to helping you plan your next trip.

Kind regards.

data.name: WelcomeHome_Email_Subject
data.value: Welcome Home!

data.name: BonVoyage_Email_Template
data.value:
EMAILBODY
MAIL
PHONENO
MOBILENO
ADDRESS1
ADDRESS2
MAIL
PHONENO
MOBILENO
ADDRESS1
ADDRESS2

data.name: WelcomeHome_Email_Template
data.value:
EMAILBODY
MAIL
PHONENO
MOBILENO
ADDRESS1
ADDRESS2
MAIL
PHONENO
MOBILENO
ADDRESS1
ADDRESS2

data.name: Ex_Exception_ExcursionPastOfferedState
data.value: The Shore Excursion cannot be removed any more.
data.comment: The excursion has been sent to TMT and cannot be removed from ADX.

data.name: Ex_CommissionService_Default
data.value: There is a problem in retrieving commission information

data.name: Biz_Quote_AddAir_PassengerPriceBreakdownsMissing
data.value: Error adding air to quote, it looks like the price server is down, please try again later. If this issue continues, please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.

data.name: Biz_Quote_AirMissingTravelers
data.value: The Air Trip does not have any assigned travelers, please assign travelers before booking.

data.name: Val_ShoreEx_Email
data.value:
Hello,

Please find attached a catalog outlining the shore excursions available with your cruise.

We provide a wide variety of exciting, appealing, and enriching shore excursions at prices that are typically lower than those of the cruise lines...

Excursions sell out quickly - please get in touch with me to reserve your spot.

Best Regards,

data.name: Biz_Quote_PlanningFees_AlreadyPaid
data.value: Planning fees can not be editied once paid for.

data.name: Biz_Quote_PlanningFees_TripHasStarted
data.value: Planning fees can not be editied once the trip has started.

data.name: Biz_PlanningFee_CannotCancel
data.value: This service can no longer be cancelled.

data.name: Biz_Quote_PassengersCannotBeAssignedToNonOfferedTravelServices
data.value: Passengers cannot be added or removed to services that have already been booked.
data.comment: Displayed if any travel service is not in offered or requote state.

data.name: Ex_Commission_NotRetrieved
data.value: Commission information was not retrieved successfully. Please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com
data.comment: There was an issue in retrieving commission values from the Commission Service API.

data.name: Biz_Quote_AirRepriceExpired
data.value: There was a problem retrieving the air reprice details, please try again or contact support.

data.name: Biz_Admin_Groups_UnsupportedFileType
data.value: The file you have selected is not supported

data.name: Biz_Air_NoPricesAvailable
data.value: No prices are available for the selected flights, please try another selection.

data.name: Ex_Exception_Client_CurrentStateInvalid
data.value: There was a problem identifying the updates to make for this client. Try again by firstly closing the current view and searching for the client.
data.comment: We could not load the previous state of the client object, or the version of the state dto no longer matches that of what we expect (due to stale data, dbcache being cleared, updates to schema or client model)

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_AccountDisabled
data.value: Your account is currently disabled. Please contact an administrator.
data.comment: Occurs with IsApproved() = false for the MembershipUser object

data.name: Biz_Quote_Travelers_CompanionsOnQuoteWithoutClient
data.value: Can not have companions on a quote without a contact
data.comment: A save or update was attempted for companions associated with a quote that did not have a contact

data.name: Biz_Quote_TravelerUpdate_ValidatingUpdatesAndChangeServiceStatusFailed
data.value: Traveler updates can not be applied as it affects services that can not be changed. E.g. Ones that are already booked.

data.name: Biz_Client_CompanionSave_NonTramsSavingIssue
data.value: There was an issue saving updates to ClientBase. Not all of your changes may be saved.

data.name: Biz_Client_CompanionSave_CompanionNoLongerExists
data.value: This companion no longer exists in ClientBase thus updates can not be made.

data.name: Biz_Client_CompanionSave_ExternalSystemIsDown
data.value: ClientBase is unavailable at this time. Only limited client and companion functionality will be available.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Cruise_NewTravelersAddedOnFCONotImplemented
data.value: Adding new travelers is not supported here. Please select existing travelers and companions or add a new one on the itinerary screen before trying again.

data.name: Val_Air_NamesTooLong
data.value: The names of the passengers are too long to be truncated sufficiently to allow the booking process to complete successfully.

data.name: Biz_Quote_Companions_MultipleProfilesOnSameQuote
data.value: Each existing traveler can only occupy one traveler block.

data.name: Biz_Air_AlreadyHaveSeatSelection
data.value: A seat has already been selected for {0} {1} on the {2} - {3} flight.

data.name: Biz_CruiseTravelService_InvalidPastPassengerNumber
data.value: An Invalid Past Passenger number has been entered. Please go back to the Travel Service Page and make the necessary changes.

data.name: Biz_Cruise_TravelService_RequoteState
data.value: Travel Service is in Requote state. Please return to the Travel Service page and perform a requote of the cruise travel service.

data.name: Biz_Client_NotAvailableDueToBrokenClient
data.value: This client needs to be associated with a Family Member before using in aDX. Please ensure in Client Base that the first and last name of the client matches the primary family member.

data.name: Ex_Air_HoldExpired
data.value: The hold for the specified price has expired, please reprice to confirm if the price is still available.

data.name: Ex_SupportTicket_NotCreated
data.value: The support ticket was not sent succesfully to the support team, contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.

data.name: Ex_SupportTicket_NotFound
data.value: The support ticket for the travel service was not found and not updated in the support ticket system. Please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.

data.name: Biz_Air_PaymentAmountDoesNotMatchFares
data.value: The payment amounts do not match the total fare for each passenger.

data.name: Ex_SupportTicket_NotUpdated
data.value: The support ticket was not updated succesfully to the support team, contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.

data.name: Val_ReadOnly
data.value: cannot be changed.

data.name: Biz_Auth_Login_NonPrimaryAgentProfileReturned
data.value: There is an issue with the setup of your account. Please contact the system administrator for support. (L:010)
data.comment: The account isn't the primary one of the agent - the GROUPNAME in trams for this primary account is not set. This could be an indiciation of a bug on the email search code on the trams ws side.

data.name: Ex_Clients_SetPrimaryCompanion
data.value: There was an error in updating this clients profile in ClientBase. Please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com.
data.comment: Occurs when a call to the primary companion update API was made and it returned a failure.

data.name: Biz_Air_CannotCancel
data.value: This service can no longer be cancelled.

data.name: Biz_Pnr_ErrorReadingPnr
data.value: There was an error reading the PNR. Please try again later or contact your administrator to look into the issue closely.

data.name: Biz_Cruise_HoldFailed
data.value: The selected cabin could not be held, please try again.

data.name: Biz_Quote_AddingServicesFailed
data.value: There was an issue when adding one or more services to your itinerary. Please check the itinerary and retry the missing services.

data.name: Biz_Finance_Meddling_Agents
data.value: This reservation has been updated in ClientBase and thus it can no longer be managed from aDX. Please use ClientBase for the ongoing management of this travel service.
data.comment: An agent has touched this travel service in ClientBase, and could not be updated/managed from aDX

data.name: Biz_Finance_Recording_Failed
data.value: There was an issue updating the reservation and/or creating invoices in ClientBase. Please contact servicedesk@traveledge.com for assistance.
data.comment: The recording of the travel service details into the finance system was not successful

data.name: Biz_Finance_CommissionInvoiceCouldNotBeCreatedCommissionReverted
data.value: There was an issue creating an invoice to track the change in commission. Please try again or contact servicedesk@traveledge.com for assistance.

data.name: Biz_CruiseModfiy_ModificationFailed
data.value: Your changes to the cruise could not be saved, please try again.

data.name: Biz_CruiseModify_SessionExpired
data.value: Your changes to the cruise could not be saved, please try again.

data.name: Biz_External_MissingBookedDetails
data.value: Confirmation number and booked date are required for Booked services.

data.name: Biz_Air_SeatMapNotSupported
data.value: The selected airline does not support seat selection via some channels for this flight. Please attempt seat selection on the airline website.

data.name: Biz_Air_NoSeatAvailability
data.value: You have requested invalid flight information. Please check the details provided and try again.

data.name: Biz_Air_CannotUseCryptic
data.value: This service cannot use the cryptic emulator.

data.name: Biz_AirModify_AutoTicketingFailed
data.value: Autoticketing failed and after-hours ticketing fees are in-effect, confirm if flight should be submitted for ticketing.

data.name: Welcome_Adx_Email_Body
data.value:
Welcome to aDX. Please paste the link below into your browser to access the system for the first time: {0}
(Note: after this first time accessing aDX, you just need to go to https://adx.traveledge.com to log in.)
You'll be asked to create a password, and to review and accept the terms and conditions of use for the site, and you are on your way to search and book travel using the world's #1 agent experience! _____________________________________________________________________________
Please do not reply to this message; it was sent from an unmonitored email address. This message is a service email related to your use of ADX.

data.name: Welcome_Adx_Email_Subject
data.value: Welcome to aDX!

data.name: Biz_Quote_AgentFeeNotAccepted
data.value: There is a fee associated with this request. You need to refresh this page and accept the fee before it can be processed.
data.comment: Edge case - the agent has not accepted the fee on the UI. This should only happen when the data in the back-end is more up to date than what is displayed to the agent.

data.name: Val_Client_Itin_Email_Booked
data.value:
Hello,
Please find attached details for your itinerary.

If you have any questions please give me a call.

Best Regards,

data.name: Biz_Air_AddTraveler_Max_Length_Validation
data.value: Could not truncate passenger names without losing details.

data.name: Biz_Air_NoSeatAvailabilityTryAllSegments
data.value: Flight Information for the flight is not available as entered. Please check the details provided and try again. If the flight is a code-share then please enter all flights before checking for booking class availability.

data.name: Biz_CruiseLine_Cabin_Availability
data.value: This cruise does not support this function.

data.name: Biz_Cruise_Invalid_Loyalty_Number
data.value: Invalid Loyalty Number

data.name: Biz_Quote_TravelerWithSameNameExists
data.value: {0} already exists as a traveler on the quote. Use the companion button to select the existing traveler for this booking.

data.name: Biz_AirModify_OneOrMoreFlightsNoLongerAvailable
data.value: One or more of the selected flights are no longer available, please choose new flights and try again.

data.name: Biz_Invoice_NotSupportedByAdxViewer
data.value: This invoice is not supported for viewing or printing.
